content:
Samantha Power, Director of the United States Agency for International Development (USAID), spoke about the important role of drones with cameras, which Skydio handed over to the Prosecutor General's Office of Ukraine.

This is stated inmessageU.S. Embassy in Ukraine.

According to Samantha Power, she met with the Skydio team.

“I recently met with the Skydio team. The drones with the cameras Skydio have handed over to the Prosecutor General's Office of Ukraine, play an important role in documenting and investigating Russian atrocities in the war, including shelling of the thunderstorm last fall. USAID thanks for partnership, ”said USAID director.

As reported by the Armyinform, in USAID 2023deliveredThere are 9 autonomous drones of Skydio to Ukraine for documenting war crimes committed by Russia in the Ukrainian territory.
title: The USAID noted the important role of Skydio drones to investigate Russian thiefs in Ukraine
